articles.title: Musk Exploring Blockchain Use in US Government Efficiency Effort - Bloomberg
articles.description: Elon Musk has initiated conversations about using blockchain technology at the new Department of Government Efficiency, according to people with knowledge of the discussions. It’s the latest sign of the Trump administration’s efforts to bolster the digital as…
